text: Santo Antônio dos Milagres (Portuguese meaning "Saint Anthony of the Miracles") is a municipality in the western part of the state of Piauí, Brazil. The population is 2,115 (2015 est.) in an area of 33.15 km².Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística ==Population history== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! title: Santo Antônio dos Milagres
